sentences.sContent: He ends it by pretending to end his life – with a guillotine.
sentences.sContent_eng: He ends it by pretending to end his life – with a guillotine.
sentences.sCn: 他表演的最后一幕是假装在断头台上结束自己的生命。

sentences.sContent: That particular one thing was invented by a Frenchman and it is called "guillotine.
sentences.sContent_eng: That particular one thing was invented by a Frenchman and it is called "guillotine.
sentences.sCn: 而这件特别的东西是由一个法国人发明的，名叫“断头台”。

trans.tranOther: a piece of equipment used to cut off the heads of criminals, especially in France in the past
